remarks: In a graph, the number of edges which contain a given vertex is not greater than the number of vertices, analogous to ~ usgraedgleord . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Jan-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 9-Jan-2020.)
statement:
usgedgleord.v $e |- V = ( Vtx ` G ) $.
usgedgleord.e $e |- E = ( Edges ` G ) $.
usgedgleord $p |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ N e. V ) -> ( # ` { e e. E | N e. e } ) <_ ( GrOrder ` G ) ) $.
$d E e $.
$d N e $.
